channel.title: source recorder help
channel.description: iv'e begun training on the source recorder but the first video i recorded was f*cked up. the souds is wierd and screechy, the video shows at thee different ''screens'' witch ther colours blinking and such. i did exactly as this [url]https://www.fpsbanana.com/tuts/5444[/url] sayed i should do. the second half somehow only has strange sound

item.title: source recorder help
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
try WeGame every source game is compatible and it can record in max res or in web res its a nifty little program.

item.title: source recorder help
item.dc:creator: ulvemann43
item.description:
iv’e begun training on the source recorder but the first video i recorded was f*cked up.
the souds is wierd and screechy, the video shows at thee different ‘‘screens’’ witch ther colours blinking and such.
i did exactly as this https://www.fpsbanana.com/tuts/5444 sayed i should do. the second half somehow only has strange sound
